attributes.action: Reverse the recent tax raid on small businesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Increasing the Small Business Tax Rate from 19 to 22% is a 16% increase in the tax take from small businesses and will restrict growth and stop businesses growing and employing more people.  This needs reversing and the rate returning to 19%.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/VATthreshold/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
